dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR10 is a 10-category classification dataset consisting of 50,000 training datasets and 10,000 test datasets, and each image has a dimension of 32 × 32.
dcterms:title: CIFAR10

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR100 has the same number of images in the training datasets and test datasets as those of CIFAR10, except that it is a 100-category classification problem.
dcterms:title: CIFAR100

dcterms:creator: Y. Netzer
T. Wang
A. Coates
A. Bissacco
B. Wu
A. Y. Ng
dcterms:description: The SVHN (Street View House Number) dataset is composed of 630,420, 32×32 RGB color images in total, of which 73,257 samples are used for training, 26,032 for validation, and the rest 531,131 for test. The task of this dataset is to classify the digit located at the center of each image.
dcterms:title: SVHN (Street View House Number)
